short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight the name of any rapper on your current desktop page to view their community Rapchr Ratings!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rapchr is a new social platform for music fans to explore and express their love for rap. Highlight the name of a rapper on any page, then click on the extension icon to view their Rapchr Ratings!
